events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund. The product I got is not what I originally purchased.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item delivered to the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the incorrect order item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can process the refund quickly?
Here is the photo of the product I got, along with my order number 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and you don’t need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick resolution! I appreciate not having to send the item back and look forward to the refund being processed.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with our resolution.
Since we have not heard back from you and the refund should be complete, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
